snippet: Dewey & LeBoeuf continued to face high-level departures and other potential indications of a shutdown on Thursday, even as the law firm's leadership denied reports that it planned to close.
abstract: Dewey & LeBoeuf continued to face high-level departures and other potential indications of a shutdown on Thursday, even as the law firm's leadership denied reports that it planned to close.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and KEVIN ROOSE

headline.main: At Dewey & LeBoeuf, Notable Departures Continue
headline.print_headline: At Dewey & LeBoeuf, Notable Departures Continue
